text: Ra aphna ba, amala'i ucca asanama basale ra sabai unaka agadi natmastaka bha'ihale, ra bhane pita jyu! ‘‘Yo mero pahileko sapana sakara bha'eko ho. Mero pratipalakale usala'i satya sabita gari dekha'idiyo. Usale mero sathama thulo upakara garyo, usale karagarabata mala'i nikalyo, ra tapa'iharula'i gamubastibata lya'idiyo, tyasa ghatanapachi jo saitanale mama ra mera bha'iharuma phuta haleko thiyo, mero palanakartale je cahancha usako lagi ramro upaya gardacha. Ra u thulo jnani ra tatvadarsi cha
